content.label: I love this game but the app craps on me a lot. Please fix the problem because it is too fun to let behave this way!!!!!
The smiling cube always cheers me up, and the colorful puzzles are fun and perplexing without being frustrating.
What I like about this game is that it is challenging without being frustrating or impossible.  I also like the easy pace - no timers, enemies or anything else to make the play frantic. Great job!
To easy

I love this game. Though it gets difficult, there are so many levels to get your fill and learn the game well enough to tackle the master levels. 
One of my favorite puzzle games. Completely replay able! All around an outstanding app!!

*****Devs please add a reset button, so we can start from scratch once we've played all the levels! In levels where I use a hint, I can't play it again without it showing me the hint each time. It would be nice to reset and/or to turn off the hint. Also some bugs causing crashes. Please help!! Thank you! Love the game.
Won't let me download app please fix
It's a great game, I love it! But it keeps crashing:-(
Overall a fun puzzle game with amiable music, and downright endearing graphics.
Awesome idea, great execution, flawless controls. If you like challenging puzzles and special orientation challenges, do yourself a favor and get this!

A fun set of puzzles. Ads pop up frequently, which is distracting and frustrating in a paid app.

Graphics are appealing. I even like the little smiley face block, which looked overly cutesy in the screenshots but which actually adds to the game when you play. I shut off the music, but the sound effects are good. Gameplay is smooth, and the whole package is well done.

Don't work 
iPhone 4 iOS 7.0.2

title.label: Latest release is broken on iPad 2

content.label: Great game, but the game now crashes upon opening on my iPad 2.
I hope you get this game.But i rage quit of epikness.

Gets my lazy brain warmed up and ready to go.  Love this game, just wish there was more!

Version 1.6.0 will NOT open on my iPad, bummer!  I will change my rating back to 5 stars when I can play again.

I'm back to five stars, great game!  Wish there were more levels! Thanks for fixing the bug in a very timely manner!
Great game but current version crashes every time i open it. Awesome besides that. You should give hints the first time the person downloads the app.
Absolutely adore this addictive game, but the current version crashes constantly for me on both iPhone 5 (iOS 6.0) and iPad 2 (iOS 6.1.3). I'll upgrade iOS to see if it resolves.
I love games that keep the mind thinking and this is one of them
I would rather not pay for hints, but otter than that it is a fun, challenging game.
The app crashed and it doesn't work what shall i do, every time i open it it closes again ! 😔
Good game, but a better tutorial would help move the learning curve faster...
This game should have some level that drop hint

title.label: Loved it before I couldn't play

content.label: This is one of my husband and mine's favorite game. It gets you thinking about the various ways the puzzles are solved. The upgrade was great, but now we can't even get to the title screen without it crashing. It's very disappointing as we've almost gotten through all the new levels added. Once this problem is fixed (and hopefully in a timely manner), I'd be more than happy to give the game the stars it deserves
It would be a great little game if you could just fix the crashing! XP
Great game that now crashes at startup.
Can't even get to the title screen before it crashes... Uninstalled and everything to no avail. This is the only game that has been this broken for me. Unacceptable!
It's still broken!!!!
Can't even open game!
KEEPS CRASHING....  FIX IT!
Was lookin forward to new puzzles but the app keeps crashing on startup!! Plz fix!!!!
Good game but keeps crashing.
Won't even let open the app!!!!! D:

Downloaded game for free.  Started playing "tutorial" and they wanted me to pay for instructions "hints".  Might be a good game but I'm not going to find out because I'm not paying for hints.  Free is free, this is not free.
This is probably the best puzzle game I've seen in awhile. It's definitely a brain teaser.
This is a very fun and addictive game
Coolness!!!
Great game, very challenging. Good for hours of strategic fun.
I'm officially addicted. It's hard but fun.
This game is like eating terd
<3 it!! This game is great!
Best game EVER!!!!
Fun enough with cool colors and easy to learn. Also it's great for both young and old cause it challenges your mind.
Great time waster!

Awesome game 
Really interesting 
I totally block out my surroundings

Just started playing this game and I am not sure if I am getting it.  I thought I understood it, because several puzzles worked, but then what I had been doing didn't work.  A couple of free hints up front would have been nice to ensure I understand the game.  I had to rate the game prematurely to get a free hint.  If this doesn't work, I will be deleting the game.
This game is nice but i think u should give more free hints especially when u get an achievement
Great way to waste time
Engaging and challenging - a nice distraction.
Great brain teaser
It's a good game, also it's really fun to play
